title: Dev-Guidance. Learning frontend by working together on projects
meta_content: Dev-Guidance — это платформа для обучения разработке фронтенда путем участия в реальных проектах. Присоединяйтесь к небольшим группам до 5 человек и вместе работайте над проектами. Получайте практический опыт, совершенствуйте свои навыки и сотрудничайте с другими в формате групповой разработки или парного программирования. Начните свой путь к становлению квалифицированным frontend-разработчиком уже сегодня!
hero_section_text: Learn frontend development together through real projects. Join an existing project or propose your own!
project_card_empty_text: There are currently no projects, but we will be back soon!
participate_text: Do you have a great project idea?
footer_text: Want to participate in the project or found a bug?
faq_list_1_ans: Anyone interested in learning frontend development can participate. You can propose a new project, join an existing one, or participate in pair programming sessions.
faq_list_2_ans: You can contribute by proposing a new project, joining an existing one, or participating in pair programming sessions. Check out the project list to get started.
faq_list_3_title: Do I need to know a specific tech stack to participate?
faq_list_3_ans: While having some knowledge of the required tech stack will be beneficial, it's not necessary. The idea is to learn as you participate. Each project has a list of required technologies, so you can join projects that align with your goals.
